name: herodotus
intro: Herodotus was an ancient Greek historian often called the 'Father of History'. He authored 'The Histories', a detailed account of the Greco-Persian Wars, which stands as the first great narrative history produced in the ancient world. His work encompassed a wide range of geographical and ethnographical information, blending historical inquiry with storytelling, though his methods sometimes relied on anecdote and hearsay alongside investigation.
